bodies.name: Venus
bodies.message: Let me guess, you have a long track list of toxic, explosive exes. You’re probably pretty crazy yourself but that doesn’t mean you should have no self preservation.

bodies.name: Jupiter
bodies.message: Damn, you like ‘em huge! There’s nothing wrong with that. Jupiter might be a lot to handle but it’s worth the effort!

bodies.name: Saturn
bodies.message: Everyone likes someone who is sociable but be careful…Saturn has a lot of space rocks orbiting it. Don’t get lost and become just another rock.

bodies.name: Neptune
bodies.message: Cool and calm. Not too clingy. You like your partner to keep their distance, just don’t drift too far away.
